title: SACM configuration error
content:
When trying to edit the SACM configuration on Service Management, the following error occurs:Â  
"Cannot invoke "com.hp.maas.platform.tenantsettings.api.TenantSettingsData.getValue()" because the return value of "com.hp.maas.platform.tenantsettings.api.TenantSettingsEtagSupportRWCache.getTenantSetting(String)" is null.

Cause

This may be due to the Redis cache that fails.

Solution

You must restart the Service Management suite. For more details, see the Restart the suite page.
